title: Core Plot provides a podspec, so you can use cocoapods as your library manager which should make installing and updating much simpler

inline_content.Text: Core Plot provides a podspec, so you can use cocoapods as your library manager which should make installing and updating much simpler

title: In the project directory add a text file to your project called Podfile by typing
pod init
c
in your project directory

inline_content.Text: In the project directory add a text file to your project called Podfile by typing

title: In the Podfile add the line pod ‘CorePlot’, ‘~> 1.6’

inline_content.Text: In the Podfile add the line pod ‘CorePlot’, ‘~> 1.6’

title: In the terminal, cd to your project directory and run pod install

inline_content.Text: In the terminal, cd to your project directory and run pod install

title: Cocoapods will generate a xcworkspace file, which you should use for launching your project (the .xcodeproj file will not include the pod libraries)

inline_content.Text: Cocoapods will generate a xcworkspace file, which you should use for launching your project (the .xcodeproj file will not include the pod libraries)
